elfarol

Class ParameterWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • elfarol.ParameterWrapper

  • public final class ParameterWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple wrapper class that handles the parameters and their values specified for the simulation.

    During each simulation initialization (the execution of ElFarolContextBuilder#build(repast.simphony.context.Context)) the actual values are updated by the reinit() method. Because of this behaviour, if the parameter values are modified during the run it is not taken into account. The parameter values may be accessed through the static interface.

    • Method Summary

      Returns the memory size of the agents (e.g., how much previous week they can remember).
      static int getOvercrowdingThreshold()
      Returns the threshold level when the El Farol Bar is declared overcrowded.
      static int getPercentAvg()
      Get the percentage of averaging agents.
      static int getPercentRand()
      Get the percentage of random agents.

      Get the percentage of smart (Markov chain) agents.
      static int getRunTicks()
      Get the number of ticks the model should run for.
      static int getStrategiesNumber()
      Returns the number of strategies an agent may operate with.
      static void reinit()
      The parameter values are queried and assigned again.

        public static int getAgentsNumber()
        Returns the number of agents.
        Returns:
        the number of agents; should be positive

      • getPercentRand

        public static int getPercentRand()
        Get the percentage of random agents.
        Returns:
        the percentage of random agents; this should be an integer between 0 and 100 (inclusive)

        public static int getPercentAvg()
        Get the percentage of averaging agents.
        Returns:
        the percentage of averaging agents; this should be an integer between 0 and 100 (inclusive)

      • getPercentSmart

        public static int getPercentSmart()
        Get the percentage of smart (Markov chain) agents.
        Returns:
        the percentage of random agents; this should be an integer between 0 and 100 (inclusive)

      • getRunTicks

        public static int getRunTicks()
        Get the number of ticks the model should run for. If this is less than 0, the model will run indefinitely.
        Returns:
        the number of ticks for the model to run for.

      • getMemorySize

        public static int getMemorySize()
        Returns the memory size of the agents (e.g., how much previous week they can remember).
        Returns:
        the memory size of agents; should be positive

      • getStrategiesNumber

        public static int getStrategiesNumber()
        Returns the number of strategies an agent may operate with.
        Returns:
        the number of strategies of an agent; should be positive

      • getOvercrowdingThreshold

        public static int getOvercrowdingThreshold()
        Returns the threshold level when the El Farol Bar is declared overcrowded.
        Returns:
        the overcrowding threshold value

      • reinit

        public static void reinit()
        The parameter values are queried and assigned again.

        It is executed at each simulation initialization, during the execution of ElFarolContextBuilder#build(repast.simphony.context.Context)).

      • getAgentType

        public static java.lang.String getAgentType()
        Get the type of agent in this simulation. Options are 'Random' for random agents (AgentRan), 'Weighted' for regression agents ( AgentWeighted), 'Markov' for Markov-chain agents ( AgentMarkov), 'Average' for averaging agents ( AgentAverage), and 'Mixed' for heterogenous agents (distributed according to the percentage parameters).
        Returns:
        a string denoting the type of agents used in this simulation.
        See Also:
        ElFarolContextBuilder#build(repast.simphony.context.Context)
